Posts.Content:
Hi, My name is Jason, Im a frequenter of the crohn's disease board and thought I would stop over here with a question. My place of employemnt is looking for some volunteer/walk activites for us to partcipate in. Does anyone know where I can find out any local evvents in the mansfield, ohio area? Zip Code 44906.
Symptoms Of Crohn's June of '06 (21 years old 285lbs). Colonoscopy in Jan '07 no sign of Crohn's.
Surgery for a Fistula in April '07, diagnosed suggestive Crohn's in May '07. August '07 small bowel follow
 through, diagnosed with Crohn's (22 years old 160lbs). On 
, Prednisone
Posts.Title: Walk
